_description: Couplets of varying line length interspersed in a Latin sermon (?by John of Bromyard), ‘de passione domini vel in Ramispalmarum’ — nine couplets

CULKk424.First Lines:
Baneres beth displaydhostes beth araydPartys byth
                    ascrydd& werryous beth y tryed…
CULKk424.Last Lines:
…þe banerys of syluer wykkyd for to bereWyt iii mennys
                    hertes y persyd wyt a spere
CULKk424.Note:
Other verses in same sermon, see 918 and 2160. Possibly incomplete since sermon ends
                    imperfectly at f. 138.
